name: Private File
summary: Learn about .PF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can open PF files with Stuffit Deluxe in Windows or macOS. However, the PF files will not open unless the correct password is entered. Also, it is important to extract the contents of a PF file on a safe device because the contents, which may be documents, images, videos, etc., are most likely sensitive.

description: A PF file is a compressed and encrypted file that is created with Stuffit Deluxe software. It is password-protected file and can only be decrypted and decompressed by applying the password. Stuffit Deluxe is a well known file compressor and expander for Mac OS and can handle more than 30 file formats including RAR, 7zip, and other popular file formats. PF files can be opened with Stuffit Deluxe software.

A PF file is a password-protected file compressed and encrypted by Stuffit Deluxe, a popular file compression and expansion utility. It is similar to a .SIT file, but requires a password to decrypt and decompress. PF files are often used for archiving confidential or personal data.
